objIdList.description: List of Item IDs concatenated with stage count. (format ID1_stageCount ID2_stageCount) Only required when passing 'thisPage' for applyto. To get stage count before this disposition action, use the call  'GET /v2/nodes/{id}/disposition-snapshots/qdate/{qdate}/reviewerid/{reviewerid}/reviewerstep/{reviewerstep}'

applyTo.description: Scope of changes: Apply change review decision to items on the page, or to all items. Valid values are 'thisPage', 'allPages', and default value is 'thisPage'. Note: Pass 'thisPage' to apply this action to the items in objIdList.

decision.description: New review decision Valid values are 'pending', 'approve', 'reject'.

reviewerID.description: ID of user specified as a reviewer

applyto.description: Scope of changes: Apply change disposition action to items on the page, or to all items. Valid values are 'thisPage', 'allPages', and default value is 'thisPage'. Note: Pass 'thisPage' to apply this action to the items in objIdList.

dispAction.description: * `0`  "None" * `1`  "Change Status" * `7`  "Close" * `8`  "Finalize Record" * `9`  "Mark Official" * `10` "Export" * `11` "Update Storage Provider" * `12` "Delete Electronic Format" * `15` "Purge Versions" * `16` "Make Rendition" * `32` "Destroy"

post.description: Create Records Management Code

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Records Management Code need to be created. Valid Codes are 'file_status', 'storage', 'accession', 'essential', 'hold_type', 'xref_type', 'rsi_status', 'stage', 'rule_code'.

vitalRec.description: Flag indicating if the essential record is vital record, only requried when creating 'essential'

DefaultPeriod.description: Default Period of the hold type, only requried when creating 'hold_type'

relatedCode.description: Related Code, only required when creating 'xref_type'

relatedDescription.description: Related Code Description, only valid and optional when creating 'xref_type'

stageOrder.description: Stage Order, only requried when creating 'stage'

post.summary: Import Records Management Table Maintenance Codes
post.description: Import Records Management Table Maintenance Codes

file.description: The XML file containing the table maintenance codes to be imported

updateExistingCodes.description: Flag that asks whether existing table maintenance codes should be updated. If not specified, false is used.

post.description: Import RSIs

file.description: The XML file containing the RSIs to be imported

updateExistingRSIs.description: Flag that asks whether existing RSIs and schedules should be updated. If not specified, false is used.

deleteSchedules.description: Flag that asks whether delete schedules that do not exist in the XML import file. If not specified, false is used.

post.description: Import Records Management System Settings

file.description: The XML file containing the system settings to be imported

parameters.description: Flag to search for deleted items, default value is false

parameters.description: Return date used to filter search results

parameters.description: External client used to filter search results,  it is only valid when where_borrower_type is set to 'external_client'

parameters.name: where_comment
parameters.description: Comment used to filter search results

parameters.name: where_pomediatype
parameters.description: Physical Item type id used to filter search results

field.description: field needs to be updated. for notification tab, valid values are `EMAIL_UserID`, `EMAIL_GroupID`, `EMAIL_OtherRecipients`; for reviewprocess tab, valid values are `reviewType`, `daysForReminders`, `assignmentPriority`, `defaultDecision`, `Workflow_ID`, `autoNotification`, `propagateRejected`, `overdueNotification`, `Workflow_Enabled`, `dispReviewer_1`, `dispReviewer_2`, `specificUserID_1`, `specificUserID_2`, `attrID_1`, `attrID_2`; for settings tab, valid values are `exportVersions`, `exportRenditions`, `restrictBoxByContents`, `disp_status_change_subitems`, `disp_mark_official_subitems`, `disp_finalize_subitems`

formApplytoSubitems.description:
for 'clearance_level'
* `ignore` Do not apply to sub-items 
* `downgrade` Downgrade 
* `upgrade`  Upgrade 
* `upgrade_downgrade`  Upgrade and Downgrade

for 'supplemental_markings'
* `ignore` Do not apply to sub-items 
* `merge` Merge with existing Supplemental Marking(s) 
* `replace`  Replace Supplemental Marking(s)

fields_order.description: List of all records management fields in display order.

rm_metadataToken.description: The metadata state token. It is used to resolve edit conflicts where two users are updating the node at the same time. If this is specified and the call is successful, the most recent metadata token will be returned in the result."

classvolumeid.description: ID of Classification Volume if user has access, zero otherwise.

canrmclassify.description: Information if user has permissions to apply RM Classification.

classvolumeid.description: ID of Classification Volume if user has access, zero otherwise.

multiclass.description: Flag indicating that multiple RM Classificatione are enabled

definitions_order.description: Default order of the fields defined in data

metadata_order.description: List of metadata in defined order

action_info.description: Status code if change of status is part of disposition action

action_performed.description: Flag indicating that item had disposition action applied

calculated_date.description: Calculated date of item in disposition search

container.description: Flag indicating whether item is a container

create_date.description: Date that item was created. (can be time-zone aware)

create_user_id.description: ID of user who created the item

disp_action.description: * `0`  "None" * `1`  "Change Status" * `7`  "Close" * `8`  "Finalize Record" * `9`  "Mark Official" * `10` "Export" * `11` "Update Storage Provider" * `12` "Delete Electronic Format" * `15` "Purge Versions" * `16` "Make Rendition" * `32` "Destroy"

disposition_process.description: Flag indicating if item should be actioned

make_rendition.description: Flag indicating if Mark Official action should include make rendition

modify_date.description: (Can be time-zone aware) The date on which the item was last modified

modify_user_id.description: ID of user who modified the item

num_vers_to_keep.description: Number of versions to keep when running purge versions action

original_id.description: ID of original item used by shortcut

owner_user_id.description: The user id of the owner of this item

purge_superseded.description: Flag indicating if only superseded versions should be purged

reserved.description: Flag indicating if item is reserved

reserved_user_id.description: ID of user who reserved the item

review_comments.description: Comments added when item is reviewed

reviewerid.description: ID of user specified as a reviewer

size_formatted.description: Size of item with appropriate unit type (for example, 7 KB or 11 items)

type.description: Item type expressed as a unique number

volume_id.description: ID of volume where item belongs

key.description: Unique identifier of column expressed as a string. Used to sort or get value, for example.

data_type.description: Data Type (5 = Boolean,-7 = Date,13 = DatePopup,401 = DateTime,2 = Integer,12 = IntegerPopup,-1 = String,10 = StringPopup,305 = SubType,14 = User,19 = UserPopup)

sort_key.description: Value by which column can be use in sorting.

locFreeForm.description: Flag indicating if free form is used for Unique ID

FromToDatesMandatory.description: Flag indicating if from and to dates are mandatory

synccontainerdates.description: Flag indicating to synchronize from and to dates when content is added to Physical Items Containers

uniqueidrequired.description: Flag indicating if Unique ID is a required field

showuniqueid.description: Flag indicating to show generated Unique ID after creating new Physical Item

useuniqueid.description: Flag indicating to use Unique ID in name generation of new Physical Item

uniqueidrule.description: Flag indicating where Unique ID is used in renaming Physical Item * `1`  Replace * `2`  Front * `3`  Back

generagesequencenumber.description: Flag indicating to generate new sequence number when creating Physical Item

pometadatabutton.description: Flag indicating to show Physical item metadata multi-select action

requestpobutton.description: Flag indicating to show Request multi-select action

borrowpobutton.description: Flag indicating to show Borrow multi-select action

returnpobutton.description: Flag indicating to show Return multi-select action

generatelabelbutton.description: Flag indicating to show Generate labels multi-select action

assignboxbutton.description: Flag indicating to show Assign box multi-select action

assignlocatorbutton.description: Flag indicating to show Assign locator multi-select action

removelocatorbutton.description: Flag indicating to show Remove locator multi-select action

assigntransferbutton.description: Flag indicating to show Assign to transfer multi-select action

verifyRSI.description: Flag indicating to verify if box RSI matches Physical Item RSI

boxReclassify.description: Flag indicating if classification of items in a box should change when parent classification is changed

deleteifdifbox.description: Flag indicating to delete box and all contents even if some of the sub items are assigned to a different box.

syncboxdates.description: Flag indicating if box From and To Dates should be automatically updated with contents From and To Dates

restrictboxdates.description: Flag indicating if items placed in a box must have a date range within the box's date range

updatestatuslocation.description: Flag indicating if update status and update location should be checked by default when assigning contents to a box

synctransfdates.description: Flag indicating if Transfer From Date and To Date should be automatically updated with item's From Date and To Date

freelocatoronborrow.description: Flag indicating to remove Physical Item from the Locator when being borrowed

numDaysToBorrow.description: Default number of days to borrrow Physical Item

acknowledge.description: Flag indicating if acknowledge is required when item is borrowed

borrowChildren.description: Flag indicating to allow users to borrow children objects from parent objects or boxes that are already borrowed.

securityoverride.description: Flag indicating if security override should be checked by default when borrowing Physical Items.

adminpurgehistory.description: Flag indicating to restrict purging circulation history to users with admin rights

accessByPermissions.description: Flag indicating to use restriced access when circulation Physical Items

midNotification.description: Flag indicating if midnight notification is enabled

emailrequest.description: Flag indicating to send email when Physical Item is requested

emailpickup.description: Flag indicating to send email when Physical Item is ready for pick up

emailInterval.description: Number of days between email notifications for overdue items

numReminders.description: Number of email notifications and escalation email for overdue items

security_enabled.description: Flag indicating if security information should be dispalyed on user profile

dynamicSecurityName.description: User Current Security Clearance Level name

fields_order.description: List of all records management fields in display order.

definitions.description: Basic data about the alpaca form

adminAuthority_Name.description: Name of the authority who enabled Records Management

apply_hold_button.description: Flag indicating if Apply hold button is enabled

bCanRMClassify.description: Flag indicating if user can apply RM Classification

catalog_mode.description: Flag indicating if RM Classification should be dispalyed in catalog mode

classified_icon.description: Flag indicating if View Records details icon is enabled

classfy_button.description: Flag indicating if Apply Classification button is enabled

declare_record_button.description: Flag indicating if Finalize button is enabled

default_classification_path.description: Location path to default RM Classification

default_prov_location_id.description: ID of default parent object for items created from Classification Workspace

default_prov_location_path.description: Location path to default parent object for items created from Classification Workspace

defaultClassBySubType.description: List of key-value pair of Sub type and default RM Classification ID

dispButtons.description: List of buttons which are enabled to be shown in Disposition snapshot view

hold_icon.description: Flag indicating if Hold icon is enabled

inheritList.description: List of sub types with inheritance enabled

licensingConfirmation.description: Flag indicating that Records Management module is enabled

managedTypes.description: List of sub types managed by Records Management

num_results.description: Default number of items returned by page

official_icon.description: Flag indicating if Official icon is enabled

rejectCommentRequired.description: Flag indicating if entering comments when rejecting items in disposition is required

remove_class_button.description: Flag indicating if Remove Classification button is enabled

remove_hold_button.description: Flag indicating if Remove hold button is enabled

rm_metadata_button.description: Flag indicating if Update record metadata button is enabled

rsi_standard_browse.description: Flag indicating if default view for accession RSI is browse

thes_at_front.description: Flag indicating if RM Classification Titling should appen RM Classification name at the front of object name

thes_name.description: Flag indicating if RM Classification Titling should appen RM Classification name or description of the object

thes_titling.description: Flag indicating if RM Classification Titling is enabled

xref_button.description: Flag indicating if Assign Cross-Reference button is enabled

totalCount.description: Number of all item in a system

cnt.description: Number of items whith specific RSI

managedRecordsCnt.description: Number of items classified with RM Classification

dispositionsCnt.description: Number of items in disposition search

oldCnt.description: Number of RM Classified items older then 20 years

totalCnt.description: Number of items in the system

rmvitalcode.description: List of Essential codes which are Vital

add.description: Flag indicating to show RM Metadata field on create page

addreq.description: Flag indicating that field is required on create page

tabreq.description: Flag indicating that field is required on Records Management tab

value.description: Flag indicating if user has specific functional access assigned
